CmdLine: apt-get update && 	apt-get install -y wget && 	wget -O - http://rpms.litespeedtech.com/debian/enable_lst_debain_repo.sh | bash && 	apt-get install -y openlitespeed lsphp73 lsphp73-apcu lsphp73-common lsphp73-opcache lsphp73-curl lsphp73-imap lsphp73-intl lsphp73-json 		lsphp73-memcached lsphp73-mysql lsphp73-recode 		lsphp73-redis && 	ln -sf /usr/local/lsws/lsphp73/bin/lsphp /usr/local/lsws/fcgi-bin/lsphp && 	apt-get clean && 	apt-get autoclean && 	apt-get autoremove --purge -y wget && 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run
